root.name: Chaos;Head Love Chu Chu!
root.description: ChäoS;HEAd Love Chu Chu! is the third game in the Science Adventure series of visual novels, and features characters from ChäoS;HEAd. It was co-developed by 5pb. and Nitroplus, and released for the Xbox 360 March 25, 2010.

similar_games.game: Corpse Party The Anthology: Sachiko’s Game of Love Hysteric Birthday 2U
